title: We have been trying to submit an extension for more than 2 months and have never received any feedback on our access request to the Store
body: We are only receiving the following message: "It looks like we've already received a submission for this Store ID. Please verify that the ID you entered is correct. If so, please bear with us while we work through all the requests we've received."

comments.body: So did you get an answer? I'm waiting since March
How long did it take to get a response?
